org.archive.wayback.resourceindex.ziplines

Class GenericBlockLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.archive.wayback.resourceindex.ziplines.GenericBlockLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BlockLoader

    public class GenericBlockLoader
extends Object
implements BlockLoader
    Generic BlockLoader, which may simplify configuration - inspecting each location to attempt to choose the correct BlockLoader: HDFS, HTTP, or LocalFile
    Author:
    brad

      • init

        public void init()

      • getBlock

        public byte[] getBlock(String url,
              long offset,
              int length)
                throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: BlockLoader
        Fetch a range of bytes from a particular URL. Note that the bytes are read into memory all at once, so care should be taken with the length argument.
        Specified by:
        getBlock in interface BlockLoader
        Parameters:
        url - String URL to fetch
        offset - byte start offset of the desired range
        length - number of octets to fetch
        Returns:
        a new byte[] containing the octets fetched
        Throws:
        IOException - on Network and protocol failures, as well as Timeouts
